front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for the Universal Test Interface Framework and Pin Configuration for Portable/Bench Top Test Requirements Utilizing IEEE 1505 Receiver Fixture Interface Standard

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This document, the Standard for the Universal Test Interface Pin Map Configuration for portable and bench top test requirements utilizing IEEE Std 1505 represents an extension to the IEEE-1505 Receiver Fixture Interface (RFI) Standard Specifications1.Particular emphasis is placed on defining within the IEEE-P1505 RFI Standard a more specific set of performance requirements that employ a universal test interface: (a) pin map configuration;(b) specific connector modules; (c) respective contacts; and (d) recommended switching implementation. This is intentionally done to standardize the footprint and validate mechanical and electrical interoperability between Automatic Test Systems (ATS).
